statements: UPDATE competitor_pricing SET price = 19.99 WHERE product_id = 101 AND competitor_name = 'ABC Inc';
UPDATE competitor_pricing SET competitor_rating = 4, price = 25.50 WHERE product_name = 'Gadget X' AND competitor_name = 'Best Deals';
UPDATE competitor_pricing SET competitor_rating = 4 WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor A' AND product_id = 101;
UPDATE competitor_pricing SET price = 15.99, competitor_rating = 3 WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor B' AND product_id = 201;
UPDATE competitor_prices SET price = 15.99 WHERE product_name = 'Apples';
UPDATE price_history SET timestamp = '2022-09-30 10:00:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE competitor_prices SET price = 19.99, competitor_name = 'BestBuy' WHERE product_name = 'TV';
UPDATE price_history SET price = 24.99, timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND price > 20.00;
UPDATE competitor_prices SET price=15.99, last_updated='2022-02-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE pricing_strategy SET description='New pricing strategy implemented' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE competitor_prices SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone' AND competitor_name = 'TechCo';
UPDATE market_analysis SET trend = 'Growing' WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND analysis_date = '2022-02-15';
UPDATE competitor_prices SET price = 25.99 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE price_history SET price = 18.75, timestamp = '2022-05-15 10:30:00' WHERE product_name = 'Product B';
UPDATE Competitors SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor Name', last_updated = NOW() WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE PricingUpdates SET competitor_id = 2, new_price = 15.99, update_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE update_id = 3;
UPDATE Competitors SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor Name' WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE PricingUpdates SET new_price = 15.99, update_date = NOW() WHERE product_id = 3 AND competitor_id = 2;
